item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:2, topic:752”]abortion == murder

they are one in the same, so you decide if its right or wrong :D[/quote]
The other side to that argument is that the foetus isn’t considered “human” by many people until it reaches a certain stage of it’s development.
I did this topic in Religion at school, as I go to a Catholic school. But yeah, it’s one of those topics in society that really get people thinking.

Read full topic

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Mr.Chris:

[quote author=VG_Kobra link=topic=622.msg5940#msg5940 date=1143217666]
I depends on the situation

I would agree with abortion if the situation involves a woman getting pregnant due to rape or if she doesn't have enough funds to support the child ( I'd say it's better off dead instead of a meager life)

I would be against it if they simply don't want a female child if it was an accident. Because of biasness of people and genders the World Population is rapidly changing between MAle and Females especially in China. If it was an accident then they HAVE TO take care of it. Babies shouldn't be aborted due to parent's carelessness.

What about if the males condom split; or something like that?[/quote]

Well then you are toying with a human being.
